author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description:
Forwardport of #35714 to master.
Updates:
- fixing warning related to missing log4cplus.properties file
- solved by performing a local copy to the working directory

FYI @sikler 

#### PR validation:
Tested in Online DQM at P5 - see: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/35714#issuecomment-948471561

#### Backport:
Backport available in #35714
title: [12.1.X] Fixes related to beamspot DIP server for pilot run
